author: markt
msg: Reduce code duplication. Convert file names to a context path in a single method.

author: minfrin
msg: RPM init script: Update the htcacheclean init script to take into
account the pid of the running htcacheclean process. This enables
htcacheclean to be enabled more than once to clean multiple caches
